example.parse: (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *pro*)) (VP (VV 能) (VP (VRD (VV 冲解) (VV 掉)) (NP-OBJ (CP (WHNP-1 (-NONE- *OP*)) (CP (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *pro*)) (VP (IP-ADV (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *PRO*)) (VP (VV 喝) (NP-OBJ (NN 酒)))) (VP (VV 留下) (NP-OBJ (-NONE- *T*-1))))) (DEC 的))) (NP (NN 辛酸) (NN 苦味))))))
example.arg: *OP* *pro* *PRO* 喝 酒 留下 *T*-1 的 辛酸 苦味
